about.heading:
A BIT
ABOUT ME— From idea to production.

process.label: How It Works
process.heading:
THE
PROCESS
process.s1desc: One call, no jargon. We define the real problem and who we're solving it for.
process.s2desc: Scope, timeline, budget — clearly defined and documented. No surprises.
